topmatter: To apply for a spot in SHIP, please fill out this form. If you wish to update your application after submitting, just return to this page, log in, change your answers, and submit again. Remember - we are accepting applicants with no experience as well as experience programmers. Only experienced programmers should fill out the last few questions.

questions.name: email
questions.label: Email (that we should use to contact you)

questions.name: transcript
questions.label: Please upload your school transcript (unofficial copy is ok)

questions.name: essay1
questions.label: What sparked your interest in our program

questions.name: essay2
questions.label: What do you want to be able to do after the program is over

questions.name: info1
questions.label: Only answer the rest of the questions if you have some coding experience. If you're a beginner, just go to the bottom of the form to submit your application

questions.name: essay3
questions.label: Describe how you learned your current programming skills

questions.name: essay4
questions.label: List the languages / environments you are familiar with

questions.name: codesample
questions.label: Please upload a code sample (can be a file, or zip)
